meanings.definition: A chemical compound used in photography and as a reducing agent.
meanings.sent1: The photographer used pyrogallols to develop the images.
meanings.sent2: Pyrogallols are essential in the process of developing photographs.
meanings.sent3: The pyrogallols in the darkroom decided to have a photo shoot of their own.
meanings.sent4: The magic of photography lies in the pyrogallols that bring images to life.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pyrogallols in the air signaled the start of a new photo project.

meanings.definition: Plural form of pyrogallol, a phenolic compound.
meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the properties of pyrogallols in their research.
meanings.sent2: Pyrogallols can be found in various plants and natural sources.
meanings.sent3: The pyrogallols at the party were the life of the gathering.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the trees whispered secrets of pyrogallols in their leaves.
meanings.sent5: The market was filled with the aroma of fresh pyrogallols from the nearby farms.
